response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and worth to me, reflecting its exceptional quality and craftsmanship. Considering its rarity and the effort put into it, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $750,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product while also allowing you to secure a remarkable asset at a favorable rate. I look forward to discussing the details with you and potentially welcoming this masterpiece into your collection.", "product_price": 750000}
